solution_line_template: He gave twice {tim_cookies} cookies to Anna which is {multiplier_anna}*{tim_cookies} = <<{multiplier_anna}*{tim_cookies}={anna_cookies}>>{anna_cookies} cookies
He gave out a total of {tim_cookies}+{mike_cookies}+{anna_cookies} = <<{tim_cookies}+{mike_cookies}+{anna_cookies}={total_given_out}>>{total_given_out} cookies
The remainder in the fridge is {total_baked_cookies}-{total_given_out} = <<{total_baked_cookies}-{total_given_out}={fridge_cookies}>>{fridge_cookies} cookies
